channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Gaming is the 'largest scale opportunity' for crypto: Polygon co-founder
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Polygon co-founder Sandeep Nailwal said growing industries “invites a lot of speculation early on” but the genuine use cases will eventually rise to the surface.

item.title: Shaquille O'Neal hit with FTX and Astral NFT suits during NBA game
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Process servers claim they were able to reach and serve the former basketball star during an NBA game at the home arena for the Miami Heat, formerly known as FTX Arena.

item.title: BTC-e founder seeks prisoner swap deal for detained WSJ journalist: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The detention of a U.S. journalist in Russia has sparked a renewed push from Alexander Vinnik, the co-founder of BTC-e for a possible "prisoner swap" deal.

item.title: Binance helped US authorities freeze $4.4M linked to DPRK cybercrime orgs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Following “lawfully served warrants,” Binance worked to flag the accounts and tie up the funds.

item.title: Gate Group launches new virtual asset trading platform in Hong Kong
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: As of May 23, users can deposit and withdraw virtual assets and participate in spot trading activities.

item.title: ZA Bank plans digital asset retail trading in Hong Kong under new guidelines
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The bank announced its plans, part of its diversification strategy, the day after Hong Kong released its new guidelines.

item.title: Bitcoin price hangs in the balance — Friday’s $2.26B BTC options could result in more downside
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bitcoin bears benefit from the current macroeconomic uncertainty and are aiming for a $270 million profit if the BTC price falls below $25,000.

item.title: Coinbase’s Base network publishes ‘path to mainnet’ outlining roadmap
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The testnet must perform the Bedrock upgrade and go through audits and stability tests before mainnet launch.

item.title: Jump Crypto finds double-voting vulnerability in Celer’s SGN
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The bug would have allowed malicious validators to compromise the network and applications that rely on it, including Celer’s cBridge.

item.title: Why is the crypto market down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: The crypto market is down today as investor fear over a regulatory crackdown on the sector remains and the fight over raising the debt ceiling carries on.

item.title: Influencer served settlement demand via NFT: Nifty Newsletter, May 17–23
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Data shows that the Bitcoin network has become the second-largest NFT chain by sales volume in the 30-day, 7-day and 24-hour metrics.

item.title: China Central Television airs crypto segment in rare move
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: CCTV programming has an audience of over 1 billion within mainland China.

item.title: Price analysis 5/24: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and altcoin prices continue to slump, but potential progress on the debt ceiling discussion could possibly produce a price reversal.

item.title: Bail revoked for Do Kwon after prosecutors in Montenegro appeal: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Kwon and former chief financial officer Han Chong-joon reportedly lived in Serbia before they were caught trying to leave neighboring Montenegro using false documents.

item.title: Ripple acquires Pantera’s stake in Bitstamp
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Pantera was one of the largest shareholders in Bitstamp until 2014, when the exchange was acquired by Belgium-based investment firm NXMH.

item.title: Multichain token plunges 30% on backend upgrade delay
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The Multichain protocol’s TVL remains largely unchanged at $1.6 billion despite a large sell-off in the token.

item.title: Bitcoin dips 5% to key support in ‘moment of truth’ for crypto market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Both BTC price and the total crypto market cap line up a retest of the 200-week moving average — a key bear market support line.

item.title: Bitfinex partnership pushes crypto adoption in Latin America
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Bitfinex announced a new investment in a Chile-based crypto exchange in an effort to boost crypto adoption in Latin America.

item.title: DeFi protocol Voltz launches SOFR swaps on Avalanche
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Investors can now hedge against interest-rate risk in a DeFi environment by trading Secured Overnight Financing Rate (SOFR) swaps.

item.title: Project takes off with $31.6M in alleged exit scam
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: On-chain detective ZachXBT believes that the project has “likely exit scammed” after bridging $31.6 million to multiple addresses on Tron and Ethereum.

item.title: Ethereum is ‘woefully undervalued’ but growing more powerful: DeFi Dad, Hall of Flame
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: DeFi Dad says he’d be shocked if Bitcoin doesn’t hit $500K within 10 years, but he thinks Ethereum is getting more powerful all the time.

item.title: Ticketing will be a huge use case for NFTs — Gary Vee
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rachel Wolfson
item.description: Popular entrepreneur and VeeFriends creator, Gary Vaynerchuck, shared his thoughts on NFT tickets, VeeCon 2024, cryptocurrency and blockchain adoption at VeeCon 2023.

item.title: Shaping the future of Web3 employment: Intropia joins Cointelegraph Accelerator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: Intropia enables the development of a professional Web3 network with the help of on-chain profiles and introductions.

item.title: Financial surveillance, privacy and CBDCs: Why are governments going cashless?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jonathan DeYoung
item.description: Attorney Marta Belcher joins The Agenda podcast to unpack financial surveillance’s vast infrastructure and warn of the potential ramifications of central bank digital currencies.

item.title: 15 important data terms you should know
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guneet Kaur
item.description: Big data, data analytics, data governance, data visualization, data integration and more. Discover these key data terms for a deeper understanding.

item.title: Why Bitcoin is stuck below $28,000 resistance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Market Report, Cointelegraph’s resident expert discusses why Bitcoin’s price is stuck near $27,000 and the next price level for the king of cryptocurrencies.

item.title: White House questions impact of AI surveillance on workers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Officials in Washington, D.C. said they would hold a listening session to understand the experiences of workers and the usage of AI surveillance in the workplace.

item.title: $160K at next halving? Model counts down to new Bitcoin all-time high
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: A bold prediction states that BTC price can gain 500% between now and April 2024.

item.title: Foresight Ventures pledges additional $10M for Web3 accelerator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The venture capital firm will allocate up to $200,000 to blockchain projects that it deems promising.

item.title: IMF optimism in Central African Republic, despite Bitcoin adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The International Monetary Fund projects 2.2% GDP growth and manageable debt, but warns of liquidity risks.
